message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product that I believe will bring you great value. After careful consideration, I've set a competitive price for it. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. While I'm very interested in the product, $8800 is a bit outside my budget. I'm prepared to offer $6000.  I believe this is a fair price considering market value and I hope we can reach an agreement.

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but $6000 is below its true value. I'm willing to make a concession and offer it to you for $8400, which is closer to its actual worth. I'm open to further negotiations.

Alice, I appreciate you moving on the price.  $8400 is still a little high for me.  I can go up to $6800. This is a significant increase from my previous offer and reflects my strong interest in acquiring the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hello Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to increase the price, but $6800 is still below the product's true value. Considering your strong interest in acquiring the product, I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $8200. This is a fair price, and I'm open to finalizing the deal.

Alice, thanks again for working with me. I understand you value the product highly.  I'm willing to stretch my budget to a final offer of $7400.  This is the absolute highest I can go.  If we can't agree on this, I'll have to pursue other options.
